name: Day Planner: A Notion Template
description: Plan your days using this Notion template. The template allows you to create and manage your tasks using the bullet journal's familiar key notation system. You can easily change the status of your task to finish, in progress, canceled, or migrated, and the keynote display will change with each checked button.In addition, the template includes a bulletin board to help you organize your schedule. The schedule has a formula that splits it up by morning, afternoon, evening, and bedtime, making it ea
